column1: NGR is from the 1950s record. Altitudes match. The 1910s record appears to be a different gauge but from the description on the record and the altitude (1200 ft. vs 1172 ft.)it appears to be within  100m or so of the Main Gauge
1936 Jul and Oct readings are noted as being corrected by observer with no explanation. Readings left in this record
Feb 1947 adjusted for snow; left in this record
1950 Dec readings is noted as being under drift (snow presumably) for a week and states weekly total given. Removed.
